tool.name: Split.groups
tool.description: Generates a fasta file for each group
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='split.groups' --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' --datasetid='$logfile.id' --new_file_path='$__new_file_path__' --new_datasets='^\S+?\.(\S+\.fasta)$:${fasta.ext}','^\S+?\.(\S+\.names)$:names' --fasta="$fasta" --group="$group" #if $name.__str__ != "None" and len($name.__str__) > 0: --name="$name" #end if #if $groups.__str__ != "None" and len($groups.__str__) > 0: --groups="$groups" #end if #if $count.__str__ != "None" and len($count.__str__) > 0: --count="$count" #end if

param.name: fasta
param.label: fasta - Fasta to split by group

param.name: name
param.label: name - Names to split by group

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The split.groups_ command reads a fasta file and group_ file and generates a fasta file for each group in the groupfile. A name_ file can also be split into groups.
.. _group: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Group_file .. _name: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Name_file .. _split.groups: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Split.groups
